Package com.ibm.streams.management.security

Interface SecuredObjectManagerMXBean

public interface SecuredObjectManagerMXBean
SecuredObjectManagerMXBean provides attributes, operations, and notifications for managing Streams secured objects.

One of the following methods can be used to build the ObjectName for a SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.

ObjectNameBuilder.domainSecuredObjectManager(String)
ObjectNameBuilder.instanceSecuredObjectManager(String, String)

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope
    Enumeration for the scope of a granted permission.
    static enum 
    SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionType
    Enumeration for the type of permissions that can be granted to principals to secured objects.

    PREFIX_BUILD_SECURED_OBJECT

    PREFIX_JOB_SECURED_OBJECT is the prefix to use with the job identifier to identify the secured object for a job.
    static final String
    PREFIX_JOBGROUP_SECURED_OBJECT
    PREFIX_JOBGROUP_SECURED_OBJECT is the prefix to use with the job group name to identify the secured object for controlling the permission needed to access the jobs in the job group.

      • Constant Field Values

    • PREFIX_JOB_SECURED_OBJECT

      static final String PREFIX_JOB_SECURED_OBJECT
      PREFIX_JOB_SECURED_OBJECT is the prefix to use with the job identifier to identify the secured object for a job. Although this is the secured object identifier for the job, permissions are granted and removed for the job using the job group defined for the job. The value is "job_"
      See Also:
      • InstanceMXBean.submitJob(String, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, boolean, String, String, String)
      • Constant Field Values

    • PREFIX_JOBGROUP_SECURED_OBJECT

      static final String PREFIX_JOBGROUP_SECURED_OBJECT
      PREFIX_JOBGROUP_SECURED_OBJECT is the prefix to use with the job group name to identify the secured object for controlling the permission needed to access the jobs in the job group. The value is "jobgroup_"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • addPermission

      void addPermission(String securedObject, String principal, PrincipalMXBean.Type principalType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionType permissionType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Adds an individual permission to a secured object for a principal.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object to which permission is added.
      principal - identifies the principal for which the permission is added.
      principalType - identifies the principal type.
      permissionType - specifies the type of permission to add.
      scope - specifies the scope of the added permission.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getGroupPermissions

      Map<String,Permissions> getGroupPermissions(String securedObject, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Returns the set of group names for which permissions have been granted to a secured object at a specified scope. The permissions granted to the secured object for each group are also returned.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which permitted groups are returned.
      scope - specifies the permission scope to check.
      Returns:
      the permitted groups and their associated permissions.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getOwner

      String getOwner(String securedObject)
      Returns the user who owns a secured object.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which the owner is returned.
      Returns:
      the owner of the secured object.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if securedObject is null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getParent

      String getParent(String securedObject)
      Returns the parent secured object for a specified secured object. If the specified object does not have a parent, a blank string is returned.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which the parent is returned.
      Returns:
      the parent of the secured object.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if securedObject is null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getPermissions

      Permissions getPermissions(String securedObject, String principal, PrincipalMXBean.Type principalType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Returns the permissions set for a principal, at a specified scope, to a secured object. This does not include permissions granted as the result of the principal being a member of a group or role.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which permissions are requested.
      principal - identifies the principal for which permission are requested.
      principalType - identifies the principal type.
      scope - specifies the scope of the permissions to return.
      Returns:
      the object permissions.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getResolvedPermissions

      Map<String,Permissions> getResolvedPermissions(String user)
      Returns all secured objects and the permissions the specified user has to them either by permission being granted to the user, a group to which the user belongs, or a role which the user has.
      Parameters:
      user - identifies the user for which permissions are returned.
      Returns:
      the secured objects and the resolved permissions the user has to them.

    • getRolePermissions

      Map<String,Permissions> getRolePermissions(String securedObject, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Returns the set of role names for which permissions have been granted to a secured object at a specified scope. The permissions granted to the secured object for each role are also returned.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which permitted roles are returned.
      scope - specifies the permission scope to check.
      Returns:
      the permitted roles and their associated permissions.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getUserPermissions

      Map<String,Permissions> getUserPermissions(String securedObject, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Returns the set of user names for which permissions have been granted to a secured object at a specified scope. The permissions granted to the secured object for each user are also returned.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which permitted roles are returned.
      scope - specifies the permission scope to check.
      Returns:
      the permitted users and their associated permissions.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • hasPermission

      boolean hasPermission(String securedObject, String principal, PrincipalMXBean.Type principalType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionType permissionType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Indicates whether a principal has a specified permission, at a specified scope, to a secured object.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which the permission is checked.
      principal - identifies the principal for which permission is checked.
      principalType - identifies the principal type.
      permissionType - specifies the permission type to check.
      scope - specifies the scope of the permission to check.
      Returns:
      true if the principal has the requested permission.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • hasResolvedPermission

      boolean hasResolvedPermission(String securedObject, String user, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionType permissionType)
      Indicates whether a user has a specified permission to a secured object either by permission being granted to the user, a group to which the user belongs, or a role which the user has.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which the permission is checked.
      user - identifies the user for which permission is checked.
      permissionType - specifies the permission type to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user has the requested permission.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • removePermission

      void removePermission(String securedObject, String principal, PrincipalMXBean.Type principalType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionType permissionType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Removes an individual permission to a secured object for a principal.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object to which permission is removed.
      principal - identifies the principal for which the permission is removed.
      principalType - identifies the principal type.
      permissionType - specifies the type of permission to remove.
      scope - specifies the scope of the removed permission.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • setPermissions

      void setPermissions(String securedObject, String principal, PrincipalMXBean.Type principalType, Permissions permissions, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
      Sets permissions for a principal, at a specified scope, to a secured object.
      Parameters:
      securedObject - identifies the secured object for which the permissions are set.
      principal - identifies the principal for which the permissions are set.
      principalType - identifies the principal type.
      permissions - specifies the permissions to set.
      scope - specifies the scope of the permissions to set.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.
